blood.post: Bilirubin is one of other indications that the Shroud is authentic.The Shroud is the visual gospel of the sufferings,death and resurrection of the Lord Jesus of Nazareth.It is a stumbling rock like His owner for those who hear but do not understand,and who see but do not perceive same as in the days of His sufferings.
